intro: Tragia chevalieri, commonly known as the velvetleaf or Mexican velvetleaf, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It thrives in warm, humid climates and is often found in disturbed soils. Tragia chevalieri is also known for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal remedies.
